RHIC REST¶

GET /api/v1/rhic/¶

The rhic’s in the system for which the user is authorized.

Sample request:

GET /api/v1/rhic/ HTTP/1.1
Host: example.com
Accept: application/json

Sample Response:

HTTP/1.0 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json

[
   {
       "account_id": "1190457",
       "contract": "3116649",
       "created_date": "2012-10-04T21:25:20.698000+00:00",

           "69",
